cause.description:
Food on Foot has provided nutritious meals, clothing, job opportunities, and assistance to the homeless and low-income individuals of Los Angeles since 1996.
Food on Foot distributes hot chicken dinners, healthy snacks and clothing to approximately 200 men, women, and children every Sunday in Hollywood.
The meal program serves as a gateway to its community clean-up program called Work for Food. This is a structured employment training program that helps the homeless build self-confidence, finds job opportunities. It helps those who are willing and able transition into permanent housing without govermnent assistance.
For more information on Food on Foot and it's accomplishments, please visit www.foodonfoot.org
